bookAuthors: Laurell K. Hamilton, Charlaine Harris, MaryJanice Davidson, Angela Knight, Vickie Taylor
plot: The bite is back in vampire fiction as five of today's most provocative authors cast their irresistible spells on you...Follow a vampire hunter who can be as deadly as her prey. Meet a down-home southern girl who's found out, much to her chagrin, that vampires are her type. Feel the euphoria of fear in the shadow of a reluctant queen of the undead. Step closer to the hot-blooded edge of passion as a strange new mythology of the night is unveiled.Includes never-before-published stories featuring vampire hunter Anita Blake and everyone's favorite vampire-loving waitress, Sookie Stackhouse.
characters: Anita Blake, Jean-Claude (Anita Blake series), Sookie Stackhouse, Garth, Jonathan Waldron, Alyec Ilychovich, Liam the God, Rhonda Armstrong, Elizabeth "Betsy" Taylor, Daniel Foster, Sophie, Bubba aka Elvis, Thomas (Tommy), Shawna, Morgana, Sue Ellen, Deadre, Galahad
setting: St. Louis, Missouri Bon Temps, Louisiana Embarrass, Minnesota Avalon, Mageverse
